uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.content

Interface ExtendedXMLBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SimpleXMLBuilder
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    XMLContentBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractXMLBuilder, HtmlBuilder, HtmlBuilder.Heading, HtmlBuilder.Panel, HtmlBuilder.SpanText, HtmlBuilder.Text, HtmlPrinter, HtmlWriter, SwingContentBuilder.XMLPanel, TextContentBuilder, XMLPrinter, XMLWriter

    public interface ExtendedXMLBuilder
extends SimpleXMLBuilder
    Interface for extended XML content (including HTML).
     

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SimpleXMLBuilder addClass(java.lang.CharSequence s)
      Convenience method to add an additional class attribute using the HTML convention that multiple classes are represented as one attribute with values separated by spaces.
      default void br()
      Insert line break.
      void nbs()
      Insert a non-breaking space.

      • Methods inherited from interface uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.content.SimpleXMLBuilder

        addObject, appendParent, attr, attr, clean, clean, clean, close, getNested, getParent, open, open, setEscapeUnicode

    • Method Detail

      • nbs

        void nbs()
        Insert a non-breaking space.

      • br

        default void br()
        Insert line break.

      • addClass

        SimpleXMLBuilder addClass(java.lang.CharSequence s)
        Convenience method to add an additional class attribute using the HTML convention that multiple classes are represented as one attribute with values separated by spaces. It is only legal to call this after a call to open and before close or clean.
        Parameters:
        s - CharSequence attribute value or null for no value
        Returns:
        reference to self
